00025 class NewStack : public StringList {
00026 public :
00027   string name;
00028   string Name() const { return name;}
00029   ReducedImageRef newStack;
00030   ImageSubtractionRef sub;
00031

00033   { name = Name;}
00034 
00035   // this class will not work if you copy objects after having assigned the
00036   // pointers newStack and sub.
00037 
00038   ~NewStack();
00039 };
